summary: This is an email from Sunny Drescher, a contractor for the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (USANYS), regarding trial preparation. The email attaches a spreadsheet linking exhibit numbers to photos with location information, and the document is marked as subject to a protective order.

persons.name: Sunny Drescher
persons.context: Sender of an email regarding trial preparation, attaching a spreadsheet that matches exhibit numbers to photos with location information.

events.title: Email regarding trial photo preparation
events.description: Sunny Drescher sends an email with an attached spreadsheet linking exhibit numbers to photos for trial preparation.

keyFacts: An email dated November 24, 2021, shows ongoing trial preparation activities related to the Epstein case.
The email attaches a spreadsheet that matches exhibit numbers to photos with location information, indicating evidentiary organization.
The document is explicitly marked as subject to a protective order covering specific paragraphs (7, 8, 9, 10, 15, and 17), highlighting the sensitivity of the material.
